import { Add, Remove } from '@material-ui/icons' import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './Cart.css' import { useStateValue } from './StateProvider'; import { getSubTotal } from './reducer' export default function Cart() { const [ {cart}, dispatch] = useStateValue(); console.log("Cart Products: ", cart, " Cart Total: ", getSubTotal(cart)) const increaseQty = (product) => { dispatch({ type: "add_to_cart", item: product }) } const decreaseQty = (product) => { dispatch({ type: "decrease_qty", item: product }) } return (
{ cart?.length ? <> <> { cart.map( product => (

{product.product_name}

Quantity

add(product)}/>

{product.quantity}

decreaseQty(product)}/>

Ksh. {product.product_price}

)) }

Order Total:

Ksh. {getSubTotal(cart)}

: <>

Empty Cart ;(

}
) }
